raw: Walter Sills was happy, deliriously so. He walked about his laboratory king of all he surveyed, strutting like a peacock, basking in his newfound glory. Eugene Taylor sat and watched him, scarcely less happy himself.
expected: Walter Sills was happy, deliriously so. He walked about his laboratory king of all he surveyed, strutting like a peacock, basking in his newfound glory. Eugene Taylor sat and watched him, scarcely less happy himself.

raw:
The last photographs put bite into his words, though. After all, you 
might
 just barely think they were men.
expected: The last photographs put bite into his words, though. After all, you might just barely think they were men.

raw: Lynn said, ruefully, “He has us there, Laszlo.”
expected: Lynn said, ruefully, <<He has us there, Laszlo.>>
